TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CssStyleCollection extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含指定 HTML 服务器控件的 HTML 级联式样式表 (CSS) 内嵌样式特性。

span.span: Contains the HTML cascading-style sheets (CSS) inline style attributes for a specified HTML server control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当包含的 Web 窗体页进行分析时，声明为特定的 HTML 服务器控件的任何样式添加到集合中。Any style declared for a particular HTML server control is added to the collection when the containing Web Forms page is parsed. 它自动分析并显示通过字典模式 API 的 CSS 属性。It automatically parses and exposes CSS properties through a dictionary pattern API. 你可以操作服务器控制通过任何 CSS 属性属性。You can manipulate any CSS property on a server control through the property. 只需使用 CSS 属性的键和值索引的集合中。Simply use the CSS property's key and value in the indexed collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例循环访问对象服务器控件。The following code example iterates through the object for an server control. 属性用于确定服务器控件中，声明了样式的属性，然后将该属性名称和值添加到Web 窗体页上的对象。The property is used to determine which style attributes have been declared on the server control, and then binds the attribute names and values to a object on the Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection/CS/css1.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection/VB/css1.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将样式项添加到控件的 中。

span.span: Adds a style item to the of a control.

span.span: Adds a style item to the of a control using the specified name/value pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要添加的样式项位于枚举，使用的重载采用的方法参数因为强类型。If the style item to add exists in the enumeration, use the overload of the method that takes an parameter because it is strongly typed. 这意味着在使用的 get 访问器中查看项目时，将导致添加的项包括属性。This means that items that are added will be included when viewing items with the get accessor of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用这两个重载方法将添加到的级联样式表， ，和一个以编程方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use both overloads of the method to add a cascading style sheet to an , , and a control programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要添加的样式项位于枚举，使用此重载方法而不采用重载参数。If the style item to add exists in the enumeration, use this overload of the method rather than the overload that does not take an parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用这两个重载方法将添加到的级联样式表， ，和一个以编程方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use both overloads of the method to add a cascading style sheet to an , , and a control programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为以编程方式添加的项的样式带的控件的集合属性或方法采用作为输入的枚举值包含在计数中的样式项目返回与属性包含在一起使用返回的字符串文本属性。Style items that are added programmatically to a collection for a control with the property or the method that take an enumeration value as an input are included in the count of style items that are returned with the property and are included with the string literal that is returned with the property. 这些特性是强类型。These attributes are strongly typed. 如果你想要添加到服务器控件的级联样式表属性存在于枚举，使用这些强类型化的方法。If the cascading style sheet attribute that you want to add to a server control exists in the enumeration, use these strongly typed methods. 如果你想要添加的属性中不存在枚举，则使用属性或方法。If the attribute you want to add does not exist in the enumeration, use the property or the method. 尝试访问中的枚举值尚未添加的控件或访问已添加了一个 CSS 属性属性或方法将返回`null`使用属性。Trying to access an enumeration value in the of a control that has not been added or to access a CSS attribute that has been added with the property or the method, returns `null` using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性返回的值上设置的样式控件。The following code example uses the property to return the value of a style that is set on a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
